文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_028_chunk2
证据片段: Five different types of cladding have been examined. Four types of standard production cladding, manufactured by different vendors, were made by a series of pilgering steps followed by recrystallization anneals. The fifth was LBQ cladding that received a beta-phase anneal and rapid quench before the next-to-last pilgering step. The final anneal for all cladding types was a stress relief anneal.
工艺步骤: pilgering steps followed by recrystallization anneals; beta-phase anneal and rapid quench; stress relief anneal
额外性质: {"texture_measurement_method": "X-ray diffraction using indirect pole figure method", "Kearns_factors_definition": "fraction of basal poles oriented in radial, circumferential, and axial directions", "CSR_test_strain": "4% axial strain", "plastic_deformation_assumption": "constant volume"}
